alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 3:15PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .The Green River will slowly fall early this week, with the stage at Paradise below flood stage through Tuesday. Several rounds of rain this week will cause the river to go back above flood stage early Wednesday. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 376.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to 390.4 feet Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
